Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Statuette
Description: A very fine bronze statuette of the god Ptah. He is depicted in characteristic standing mummiform pose, holding a was-sceptre before him. Details are delicately modelled and the eyes and collar are gilded. He wears a close fitting cap and has a beard. There is a peg at the bottom for the base.
